name: Red points
description:
Red points - this is a game in which you need to destroy enemy spaceships, which are marked on the radar.

The galaxy has long been no peace in the galaxy it is impossible to live without war! That's why you have to control the radar in the on-Board computer of your spaceship! Destroy enemy spaceships so as not to catch your allies! Green color denoted by your allies, but red color denoted by your opponents! Destroy all enemy spaceships to complete the mission! You only have three rights to make a mistake! Good luck!

Key features:
- Events unfold in the distant future!
- You don't have to go outside. All controls will be on the radar.
- You're not getting hurt!
- Achievements
- Sound!
